page.title: 18ACTIVITIES_WORLINGTON AREA
page.content: There is plenty to do in our area if you want to join a group.The school has a P.T.A which organizes fund raising and social events.There is a W.I. which meets each month. Choir meets every Friday in W.Worlington church. 8 children from school belong. In Winter there is table tennis in the Parish Hall. In Summer you can play tennis in Lady Steven's garden.Scouts, Brownies, Cubs, Guides and Majorettes all meet at Witheridge which is 2 miles away.We have 6 Cubs,2 Brownies,2 Guides and 2 Majorettes.Anna goes to Girls Brigade at Lapford and Bronia goes to Adventure Club.5 children belong to Pony Club at RoseAsh and 4 children go to Sunday School.Evening classes are run by Chulmleigh Community College with a computer class in school last Autumn. Camille goes to art at Morchard Bishop.
